item.title: ticket
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree

item.title: single-submit
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
//******renders edit block*******// [templates.add edit_block] //****set data as json decode*****// [do.single_data] [env.set single_data.block={template.block_details.json_decode}/] [service.run {single_data.block.edit_service.action}/] //****loop through all the fields****// [loop.@field single_data.block.field set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.field"] [this_collection.field.edit/] [/loop.@field] //*****generate tickets****// [this_collection.ticket.generate tpl='update_meta' o.set=template.ticket/] //*****get unique form name for each form*****// [template.set form_name = "form_{unique_number}"/] //*****render edit fields*****//
EDIT: [env.single_data.block.label/]
[template.html/] [this_collection.field.update_btn form_name={template.form_name} ticket={template.ticket}/]
[/do.single_data] [/templates.add] //*****handles add meta request***// [templates.add add_meta] //*****add data*****// [do.single_data] [env.set single_data.block={template.block_details.json_decode}/] [env.set single_data.request={request}/] [service.run {single_data.block.add_service.action} set=template.ack/] //*****script run ****// [manage_service.alert msg={template.ack.reason} msg_type={template.ack.status} set=template.msg/] [/do.single_data] [/templates.add] //*****handles update request****// [templates.add update_meta] //*****update data*****// [do.single_data] [env.set single_data.block={template.block_details.json_decode}/] [env.set single_data.request={request}/] [service.run {single_data.block.update_service.action} set=template.ack/] //*****script run ****// [manage_service.alert msg={template.ack.reason} msg_type={template.ack.status} set=template.msg/] [/do.single_data] [/templates.add]

item.title: field
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree

item.title: blocks
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
item.content:encoded:
//**Personal Details action: display_form display edit (conditional) edit_form edit add_form new add form **// [templates.add editable_personal_details] [env.set_array single_data.blocks.new] [atts label = "Personal Details" lapp_id={single_data.lapp_id} meta_data={single_data.lapp_meta} /] [action]display_form[/action] [edit_service action="common_service.lapp.get_edit_data"/] [update_service action="common_service.lapp.update_edit_data"/] [field personal_email label="Personal Email Id" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field full_name label="Full Name" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field fathers_name label="Father's name" edit="yes" data_type="text" /] [field mothers_maiden_name label="Mother's maiden name" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field dob label="Date of birth" edit="yes" data_type="date"/] [field job_type label="Job type" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="job_type"/] [field mobile_number label="Mobile no." edit="yes" data_type="number"/] [field educational_qualification label="Education qualication" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="educational_qualification"/] [field gender label="Gender" edit="yes" data_type="select" data_type="select" taxonomy="gender"/] [field marital_status label="Marital Status" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="marital_status" /] [field no_of_dependents label="No of dependents" edit="yes" data_type="text"/] [field employment_year label="Years of employement" edit="yes" data_type="select" taxonomy="employment_year"/] [/env.set_array] [/templates.add]//***single page wrapper***// [templates.add main] //******display form label and values in horizontal manner*****// [module.set_array args form_type="horizontal" bs3_label_class="col-md-4 text-right" bs3_control_class="col-md-8"/] //****loop through all the blocks****// [loop.@block single_data.blocks set=template.html] [env.get @block.item o.set=single_data.block /] [templates.render_block /] [/loop.@block] //*******render page******// [ui.outer-block title={template.header} html={template.html}/] [/templates.add] //*****render single block*****// [templates.add render_block] //****store action in variable at template level, default is: display_form*****// [env.get single_data.block.action set=template.action default="display_form"/] //*****get unique_id for each block*****// [template.set unique_id = "section_{unique_number}"/] //****set empty html***// [template.set html=''/] //*****when action is html******// [if.empty template.html] [env.get single_data.block.html set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.html"/] [/if.empty] //*****when action is custom* [if.empty template.html] [templates.display_form c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:display_form"/] [/if.empty] *****// //*****when custom_service is available******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.custom_loader set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.custom_service.action"/] //****[service.run {single_data.block.custom_service.action} set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.custom_service.action"/]***// [/if.empty] //*****when action is add_form******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.add_form set=template.html c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:add_form"/] [/if.empty] //*****when action is edit_form******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.edit_form set=template.html c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:edit_form"/] [/if.empty] //*****when action is display_form******// [if.empty template.html] [templates.display_form set=template.html c.cond="template.action" c.eq="s:display_form"/] [/if.empty] //*******render section block section*****// [form_control.section id={template.unique_id} html={template.html} title={single_data.block.label} open={single_data.block.open}/] [/templates.add] //****when action is add_form****// [templates.add add_form] //*****if fields are not empty, loop through all the fields******// [loop.@field single_data.block.field set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.field"] [this_collection.field.edit/] [/loop.@field] //******generating form name******// [template.set form_name="add-form-{unique_number}"/] //****section field html*****//
//*****render fields******// [template.html/] //*****if edit is not empty, show edit button****// [content.run c.not_empty="single_data.block.add_service.action"] //*****generate tickets****// [this_collection.ticket.generate tpl='add_meta' set=template.ticket/] //****generating add_btn for current form****// [this_collection.field.add_btn ticket={template.ticket} form_name={template.form_name}/] [/content.run]
[/templates.add] //****when action is edit_form****// [templates.add edit_form] //*****if fields are not empty, loop through all the fields******// [loop.@field single_data.block.field set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.field"] [this_collection.field.edit/] [/loop.@field] //****section field html*****//
//******generating form name******// [template.set form_name="edit-form-{unique_number}"/]
//***render form fields***// [template.html/] //*****if edit is not empty, show edit button****// [content.run c.not_empty="single_data.block.edit_service.action"] //*****generate tickets****// [this_collection.ticket.generate tpl='update_meta' set=template.ticket/] //****generating edit_btn for current form****// [this_collection.field.edit_btn ticket={template.ticket} form_name={template.form_name}/] [/content.run]
[/templates.add] //****when action is display_form****// [templates.add display_form] //*****if fields are not empty, loop through all the fields******// [loop.@field single_data.block.field set=template.html c.not_empty="single_data.block.field"] [this_collection.field.display/] [/loop.@field] //****section field html*****//
[template.html/]
//*****if edit is not empty, show edit button****// [content.run c.not_empty="single_data.block.edit_service.action" cond='{single_data.block.editable}' not_equal='false'] //*****generate tickets****// [this_collection.ticket.generate tpl='edit_block' set=template.ticket/] //****generate edit button****//
[/content.run]
//*****edit area*****//
[/templates.add] //***loads custom service***// [templates.add custom_loader] //****set passed collection in a variable****// [template.set coll = {single_data.block.custom_service.action.dot}/] //**run module**// [module.run {template.coll.1} template={template.coll.2} post_type={template.coll.0}/] [/templates.add]

item.title: display
item.dc:creator: bhagyashree
